# Utility functions
script <- function(file) source(file.path("scripts", file))

fa <- function(icon) paste0('<i class="fa fa-', icon, '"></i>')
error_print <- function(expr) {
  e <- tryCatch(expr, error = function(e) e$message)
  cat("Error in <...>:", e, sep = "\n")
}
